description:
Security and access control measures including formation of new entryphone entrance lobbies at three entrances. Formation of new refuse stores and disposal chutes. Construction of two escape stairs.  Redesign of parking area outside 1-15 Carnoustie Drive. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  DS2320; AL0101; DS2320/1; AS/0201,                         0202, 0203, 0204, 0205, 0801, 0802,                         DS2320/AB/0201, 0202, 0203, 0204,                         0205, 0801, DS2320/AB0211
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990
